---
title: "Census tracts for landfill data"
author: "Kylie Wheelock Riley"
date: "11/27/2019"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(tigris)
```

Load in data 
```{r}
landfill_df = read_csv(file = "./data/Solid_Waste_Landfill_Facilities.csv") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  select(-zip4, -telephone, -type, -status, -naics_code, -source, -sourcedate, -val_method, -val_date, -website, -reg_id, -statusdate, -owner, -close_date, -permit_no)
```

```{r}
census.tracts = tracts(state = "DE")
plot(census.tracts)
census.tracts.fort = fortify(census.tracts)
```

Get census tract
```{r}
landfill_df %>% 
  filter(
    state == "DE"
  ) %>% 
 mutate(
   census_code = apply(landfill_df, 1, function(row) call_geolocator_latlon(row['latitude'], row['longitude']))
 )
```
